Object.Description: A pet received by donating to the server!
A pet received by donating to the server!
This pet do +2/9 hit points and +1/2 magic points healing every 2 seconds. He can deal ghost damage 10 per turn on max range 7.5. PET EFFECT: Slow for 3 seconds.
This egg give to you a pet with tier 0. You can check your pet status in Pet Shop at Nexus.
